sentences.english: Minimum 3 years working experience in inspection.
If you cannot come you can send an inspection tein the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你来不了也可能叫验货公司。

sentences.english: We have commission bureau opcommodity inspection and quarantine( bcc) to conduct inspection.
sentences.chinese: 我们已委任商品检查和检疫机构进行验货。

sentences.english: Please make sure you will have below for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 在验货前，请备齐以下资料。

sentences.english: Do you carry out pre-shipment inspections independent from the factory?
sentences.chinese: 是否请工厂以外的第三方进行出货前验货？

sentences.english: Fourth, if the law should apply for inspection of goods inspection procedures.
sentences.chinese: 若是法检商品应办理验货手续。

sentences.english: What are the distributor’s rights to inspect and test?
sentences.chinese: 分销商验货和测试的权利怎样？

definition: to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to return a product for another item
to ascertain/to identify/to verify (sb's identity etc)
variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
